index.title: RITMO, a vertical rhythm sass toolkit

configvar01.title: $BASE-FONT-SIZE: 16PX
configvar01.description: The default font size for all text in pixels

configvar02.title: $RHYTHM-UNIT 'EM'
configvar02.description: The length unit in which to output rhythm values. Supported values: px, em, rem. Percent units can't be used since they make calculating padding and margins impractical, and percentage borders are not valid or supported in css.

configvar03.title: $BASE-FONT-SIZE: 16PX
configvar03.description: The default font size for all text in pixels
